column5: Yesterday i was fishing with my father: We went to midland for some herring – spent 3 hours from 7 am to 10 am, no fish. Didn’t mark any, 42 fow. Left after 10. Went to Couch lake – started  around 11 am. Slow bite, were fishing shallow area – 6 - 14  fow. Got a pike, moved to 24 fow for perch right after pike was caught. Got some good perch action after that until the end, left at 4 pm.
Nicely done.....got a good little fry there.  What were you using?
A father and son outing. Good stuff Cosmos, thanks for sharing.
I was using Lindy's Fly spoon tipped with big minnow, father - mostly jigging Raps tipped with Janson eggs or Berkley Gulp maggots. Pike was caught on tip-up with big shiner.
Some nice perch, Cosmos.  Hoping to get out with my "old man" a few times this year.
Good stuff... can't argue with a feed like that!
